
### Result files

#### All genes

```{r links_all, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
#TODO change directory to local for report
files_all = list.files(outdir, pattern = "_all.txt")
for(x in files_all) {
  string = paste0("\n\n", "* ","#####","[",x,"]","(","./",x,")", "\n\n")
  cat(sprintf(string))
}
```
